com.github.deltaspikedbunit.dataset

Interface DataSetLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataSetLoader, FlatXmlDataSetLoader, ReplacementDataSetLoader

    public interface DataSetLoader
    Strategy interface for loading a dataset.

    Concrete implementations must provide a public no-args constructor.

    Author:
    Luigi Bitonti, Phillip Webb
    See Also:
    FlatXmlDataSetLoader

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.dbunit.dataset.IDataSet loadDataSet(Class<?> testClass, String location)
      Loads and returns dataset for the specified class and location.

    • Method Detail

      • loadDataSet

        org.dbunit.dataset.IDataSet loadDataSet(Class<?> testClass,
                                      String location)
                                        throws Exception
        Loads and returns dataset for the specified class and location. If the dataset cannot be found null may be returned.
        Parameters:
        testClass - The class under test
        location - The location to load
        Returns:
        a dataset or null
        Throws:
        Exception - If the dataset cannot be loaded
